title: Sean McDermott - Wikipedia
snippet: Sean Michael McDermott (born March 21, 1974) is an American professional football coach who is the head coach for the Buffalo Bills of the National Football League (NFL). He began his NFL coaching career as an assistant for the Philadelphia Eagles in 2001, serving as defensive coordinator from ...

title: Buffalo Bills head coach history | Pro Football History.com
snippet: Ramsey was the head coach for the Buffalo Bills in the 1960-1961 seasons, a total of two years. Buster Ramsey was the first head coach in Bills history in 1960. Marv Levy coached the most seasons as the Bills's head coach at eleven seasons. Sean McDermott is the current head coach, starting ...

title: Buffalo Bills Head Coach Record | StatMuse
snippet: Sean McDermott has coached the Bills from 2017 to 2025.
